Package simplenlg.format.english

The format package currently contains only a single class, a plain text processor for English.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HTMLFormatter
    This processing module adds some simple plain HTML formatting to the SimpleNLG output.
    NumberedPrefix
    This class keeps track of the prefix for numbered lists.
    TextFormatter
    This processing module adds some simple plain text formatting to the SimpleNLG output.

Package simplenlg.format.english Description

The format package currently contains only a single class, a plain text processor for English. The formatters are designed to added ease-of-reading formatting to the final text.
